personal.name: Tarequl Islam
personal.title: Full-Stack Software Engineer
personal.bio: Backend Developer & UI/UX Designer passionate about building efficient systems and user-friendly designs.
personal.aboutBio: I am a Computer Science and Engineering student at United International University with a strong interest in Data Science and Backend Web Development. As I begin my journey in the tech field, I am eager to build practical skills by working on meaningful projects that provide valuable learning opportunities. I am passionate about problem-solving, exploring data-driven insights, and developing efficient backend systems. With curiosity and determination, I look forward to growing my expertise while collaborating with peers and professionals in the field.

programmingLanguages.name: Python
programmingLanguages.description: Advanced - Backend development, Django, data analysis

experience.details: Developed RESTful APIs using Node.js and Express. Collaborated with frontend developers to integrate APIs with React applications. Improved database performance by optimizing queries in MongoDB.
Designed and developed responsive websites for small businesses using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React. Implemented backend services with Node.js and Express, ensuring seamless user experiences.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
education.details: Currently pursuing a B.Sc. in Computer Science with a focus on software development and data structures.
